divs: Sighting DetailsWhile sitting on the porch of my apartment having a cigarette I randomly took a picture of the sun. The second picture is a closeup of the object.
trends: There have been 32 other sightings in La Porte
There was one other sighting in La Porte on or around June 7th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: On porch taking picture of the sun
